Title: Relates to redetermination based on income for a tax abatement for rent-controlled and rent regulated property occupied by senior citizens or persons with disabilities
Summary: Relates to redetermination based on increases in income for a tax abatement for rent-controlled and rent regulated property occupied by senior citizens or persons with disabilities.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to redetermination based on income for a tax abatement for rent-controlled and rent regulated property occupied by senior citizens or persons with disabilities
